serialization.name: Block - 100%
serialization.description: Simple block, relatively positioned with overflow=scroll.

strings.jsxtext: 如果您不输入商品货号，系统将自动生成一个唯一的货号。
会员价格为-1时表示会员价格按会员等级折扣率计算。你也可以为每个等级指定一个固定价格
购买该商品时最多可以使用多少钱的积分

events.jsxexecute: jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());
jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());
jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());
jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());
jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());

strings.jsxtext: 打勾表示允许销售，否则不允许销售。

events.jsxexecute: jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());

strings.jsxtext: 打勾表示能作为普通商品销售，否则只能作为配件或赠品销售。

events.jsxexecute: jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());
